title: Integrative Approach to Online Learning Design and Mindfulness: Mathematics Education Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners from Medical/Legal/Technical Fields Design Elementary Mathematics Education Content Using Simulation/VR Environments, Developing Real-World Applicable Solutions via Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can represent through concept mapping an online math learning simulation design framework incorporating mindfulness principles (attention focus, openness, cognitive flexibility)
Learners can propose at least three mindfulness-based activity design strategies to enhance cognitive engagement in VR environments
Learners can reevaluate their design models and derive improvements through peer feedback and critical incident interviews
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
